items.title: He left Gaza and fled to Europe on a jet ski. Now he hopes to bring his family
items.description: In an extraordinary journey, a Palestinian man used a jet ski to cross the Mediterranean Sea and reach Europe after he fled the war in Gaza.

items.title: A bowhead whale's DNA offers clues to fight cancer
items.description: Scientists searching for new ways to combat cancer think they may have uncovered a promising new lead in the DNA of the bowhead whale.
